channel.title: Problems with the MC Server status page
channel.description: whenever i want to add my mc server to the mc server status page i have to login but when i logged in i keep getting forwarded to the forums :/ is there a problem with that status page? yes/no :/ please help me

item.title: Problems with the MC Server status page
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:4, topic:537792”]The page should just be removed, it was like two years late and never worked properly. I’d suggest you use the forum to advertise your server:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,184.0.html

I’m sorry about that.[/quote]i’m sorry bout that still thx to notify me bout it close pls!

Read full topic
item.source: Problems with the MC Server status page
